ctx: intros m0 m1 p H1 H2 H3.

original: intros m0 m1 p H1 H2 H3. unfold prec_in_state in *. intros [c H4]. apply H3 in H4 as H5. apply Nat.le_trans with (m := taille_0 p). - apply H1. exists c. apply H5. - apply Nat.max_lub. + apply Nat.le_trans with (m := taille_1 m0). * apply H1. exists c. apply H5. * apply Nat.min_le_compat. apply H2. exists c. apply H5. + apply Nat.le_trans with (m := taille_1 m1). * apply H1. exists c. apply H5. * apply Nat.min_le_compat_r. apply H2. exists c. apply H5.
